get.summary: ListLastRxByApplicationID lists the devices by the given application ID, sorted by the name of the device.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of devices to return in the result-set.

parameters.name: multicastGroupID
parameters.description: Multicast-group ID to filter on (string formatted UUID).

parameters.name: serviceProfileID
parameters.description: Service-profile ID to filter on (string formatted UUID).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of devices to return in the result-set.

parameters.name: multicastGroupID
parameters.description: Multicast-group ID to filter on (string formatted UUID).

parameters.name: serviceProfileID
parameters.description: Service-profile ID to filter on (string formatted UUID).

get.summary: Get returns the device matching the given DevEUI.

delete.summary: Delete deletes the device matching the given DevEUI.

get.summary: GetActivation 返回设备的当前激活详细信息 (OTAA and ABP).
cumulativeAmount 获取给定设备的指定日的日用水量

delete.summary:
ClearDeviceNonces deletes the device older activation records for the given DevEUI.
  * These are clear older DevNonce records from device activation records in Network Server
  * These clears all DevNonce records but keeps latest 20 records for maintain device activation status

get.summary:
StreamEventLogs stream the device events (uplink payloads, ACKs, joins, errors).
  * This endpoint is intended for debugging only.
  * This endpoint does not work from a web-browser.

StreamFrameLogs streams the uplink and downlink frame-logs for the given DevEUI.
  * These are the raw LoRaWAN frames and this endpoint is intended for debugging only.
  * This endpoint does not work from a web-browser.

post.summary: GetRandomDevAddr returns a random DevAddr taking the NwkID prefix into account.

get.summary: GetKeys 返回给定 DevEUI 的设备密钥

delete.summary: DeleteKeys deletes the device-keys for the given DevEUI.

get.summary: GetLastRxInfo returns the LastRxInfo for the given DevEUI.
MonthConsumption 获取给定组织指定月的用水量.考虑到未到月尾，月统计表还未生成，故需在天统计表累加

put.summary: SetDeviceOrg 设置设备归属组织
SetDeviceParent 设置设备归属父节点

get.summary: DeviceReportData returns 根据设备eui获取设备上报明细、日用量、月用量、年用量、累计用量

put.summary: SetDeviceOrg 设置设备归属场景

post.summary: CreateSKeys Sesion key creat the device (for LoRaWAN MAC version  1.0).

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
Aggregation interval.  One of "second", "minute", "hour", "day", "week",
"month", "quarter", "year".  Case insensitive.

put.summary: SetDeviceOrg 设置设备归属用户

get.summary: cumulativeAmount 获取给定组织指定年份的用水量.理由同上。不过需要先获取当前月份之前的月份的累加，然后在加上剩下的不满月的

put.summary: Update updates the device matching the given DevEUI.

post.summary: Activate (re)activates the device with the given parameters (for ABP or for importing OTAA activations).

get.summary: GetReginDevices returns 区域内所有设备列表

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset offset of the result-set (for pagination).

name.description: Name of the device (if left blank, it will be set to the DevEUI).

applicationID.description:
ID of the application to which the device must be added.
It is possible to move a device to a different application on update,
given that both the old and the new application share the same
service-profile.

variables.description:
Variables (user defined).
These variables can be used together with integrations to store tokens /
secrets that must be configured per device. These variables are not
exposed in the event payloads.

tags.description:
Tags (user defined).
These tags are exposed in the event payloads or to integration. Tags are
intended for aggregation and filtering.

skipFCntCheck.description: Skip frame-counter checks (this is insecure, but could be helpful for debugging).

referenceAltitude.description:
Reference altitude.
When using geolocation, this altitude will be used as a reference
(when supported by the geolocation-server) to increase geolocation
accuracy.

sNwkSIntKey.description: Serving network session integrity key (HEX encoded).

fNwkSIntKey.description: Forwarding network session integrity key (HEX encoded).

nwkKey.title:
Network root key (HEX encoded).
Note: For LoRaWAN 1.0.x, use this field for the LoRaWAN 1.0.x 'AppKey`!

appKey.title:
Application root key (HEX encoded).
Note: This field only needs to be set for LoRaWAN 1.1.x devices!

genAppKey.description:
Gen application key (HEX encoded).
This is an optional key that only must be set for LORaWAN 1.0.x devices
that implement the remote multicast setup specification.

deviceProfileID.description: Device-profile ID attached to the device.

deviceStatusBattery.description:
The device battery status (deprecated, use device_status_battery_level).
0:      The end-device is connected to an external power source
1..254: The battery level, 1 being at minimum and 254 being at maximum
255:    The end-device was not able to measure the battery level
256:    The device-status is not available.

deviceStatusMargin.description:
The device margin status
-32..32: The demodulation SNR ration in dB
256:     The device-status is not available.

deviceStatusExternalPowerSource.description: Device is connected to an external power source.

deviceStatusBatteryLevel.description: Device battery level as a percentage.

lastSeenAt.description:
The last time the application-server received any data from the device,
or an empty string when the device never sent any data.

gwRssi.description: Average RSSI (as reported by the gateway(s)).

gwSnr.description: Average SNR (as reported by the gateway(s)).

LastRx.description: receiving One of the best the last uplink message.

deviceStatusBattery.description:
The device battery status
0:      The end-device is connected to an external power source
1..254: The battery level, 1 being at minimum and 254 being at maximum
255:    The end-device was not able to measure the battery level
256:    The device-status is not available.

deviceStatusMargin.description:
The device margin status
-32..32: The demodulation SNR ration in dB
256:     The device-status is not available.

location.description:
Device location.
This will set when the network-server was able to resolve the location
using the geolocation-server.

totalCount.description: Total number of devices available within the result-set.
Total number of devices available within the result-set.

deviceProfileID.description: Device-profile ID attached to the device.

deviceStatusBattery.description:
The device battery status (deprecated, use device_status_battery_level).
0:      The end-device is connected to an external power source
1..254: The battery level, 1 being at minimum and 254 being at maximum
255:    The end-device was not able to measure the battery level
256:    The device-status is not available.

deviceStatusMargin.description:
The device margin status
-32..32: The demodulation SNR ration in dB
256:     The device-status is not available.

deviceStatusExternalPowerSource.description: Device is connected to an external power source.

deviceStatusBatteryLevel.description: Device battery level as a percentage.

lastSeenAt.description:
The last time the application-server received any data from the device,
or an empty string when the device never sent any data.

nwkKey.title: For LoRaWAN 1.0.x, use this field for the LoRaWAN 1.0.x 'AppKey`!

joinNonce.description: JoinNonce represents the join-nonce，Note that the max value is 2^24 - 1 = 16777215.

fNwkSIntKey.description: Forwarding network session integrity key (HEX encoded).

sNwkSIntKey.description: Serving network session integrity key (HEX encoded).

payloadJSON.description: The event payload in JSON encoding.

commonLocationSource.description:
- UNKNOWN: Unknown.
 - GPS: GPS.
 - CONFIG: Manually configured.
 - GEO_RESOLVER_TDOA: Geo resolver (TDOA).
 - GEO_RESOLVER_RSSI: Geo resolver (RSSI).
 - GEO_RESOLVER_GNSS: Geo resolver (GNSS).
 - GEO_RESOLVER_WIFI: Geo resolver (WIFI).

commonModulation.title:
- LORA: LoRa
 - FSK: FSK
 - LR_FHSS: LR-FHSS

gwCRCStatus.description:
- NO_CRC: No CRC.
 - BAD_CRC: Bad CRC.
 - CRC_OK: CRC OK.

delay.description:
Delay (duration).
The delay will be added to the gateway internal timing, provided by the context object.

gatewayID.description:
Gateway ID.
Deprecated: replaced by gateway_id in DownlinkFrame.

board.description: The board identifier for emitting the frame.

antenna.description: The antenna identifier for emitting the frame.

timing.description: Timing defines the downlink timing to use.

context.description:
Gateway specific context.
In case of a Class-A downlink, this contains a copy of the uplink context.

supportsClassD.title:
classd模式会发长包唤醒,目的是拓展低功耗实时唤醒(上行classA,下行classC)
下行要求 server不需要缓存应用服务数据 直接下发（类似class c）
上行任务  rxwin1 rxwin2 信道要求按照class a  这里主要是修改时间信道等mac参数

gwDownlinkTiming.description:
- IMMEDIATELY: Send the downlink immediately.
 - DELAY: Send downlink at the given delay (based on provided context).
 - GPS_EPOCH: Send at given GPS epoch value.

aesKeyIndex.description: AES key index used for encrypting the fine timestamp.

encryptedNS.description: Encrypted 'main' fine-timestamp (ns precision part of the timestamp).

gwFineTimestampType.description:
- NONE: No fine-timestamp available.
 - ENCRYPTED: Encrypted fine-timestamp.
 - PLAIN: Plain fine-timestamp.

time.description: RX time (only set when the gateway has a GPS module).

timeSinceGPSEpoch.description: RX time since GPS epoch (only set when the gateway has a GPS module).

uplinkID.description:
Uplink ID (UUID bytes).
Unique and random ID which can be used to correlate the uplink across multiple logs.

nsDeviceGatewayRXInfo.description:
DeviceGatewayRXInfo holds the meta-data of a gateway receiving the last
uplink message.
